column2: "Leader, I've got an idea! Let's have Khorshid try some food from here on the ARKS Ship!"
"I bet that once she's had a delicious meal, she'll soften right up!"
"In fact, Franca taught me a secret recipe a little while ago. I've been dying to try it out!"
"Now, the ingredients... I don't have any Desert Pepper. They're absolutely vital to the flavour."
"Leader, could you pick me up some Desert Pepper? I'll stay here and prepare the rest."
